name: div
features: Delivery : FAST & FREE Shipping on all orders
Rolling Design : Smooth wheels make transporting balls to & from the field effortless
Spring-Loaded Basket : Easy ball access for coaches during batting practice, reducing strain
Spacious Capacity : Holds a large volume of baseballs for efficient practice sessions
Locking Mechanism : Keeps balls securely stored when not in use
Durable Construction : Built for long-lasting use through repeated practices & travel
